name: LC 01 - The Lackey
description:
LOST CASES - The Lackey
(from the DARK series)

"Lost to time, The Lackey was the first horrid abomination created by the scientians. It was made to slave the laboratory and assisted in the resurrection of the emperor, during the age of light. It suddenly vanished one day and was never to be found. Rumors remain that it was caught trying to escape and was fed to the blood-mongering wolves."

"SCIENTIA" collectors and current holders have been sent this piece to their wallets. Not only is this a token of appreciation to all the collectors but also these special daguerreotypes will possess utility in the future. 
--
LOST CASES offer extended insight regarding the background and expand with hints on the lore that not only give you the chance to piece the puzzle but also provide the timeline of events within the DARK universe.
